text: Based Depid, takaw agɨl tɨkak anɨb ak, nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agɨl tɨkak agɨlak. Gapman bɨnonɨm Helod ayɨp Podiyus Paylat ayɨp, binɨb Juda mel ogɨnap, Yislel nɨb ogɨnap apɨl takaw ag adek nokom lɨlak agɨlak. Aglɨl, bɨ wog gɨñeb nad Jisas ak nop gɨ tɨmel gɨlak, man awl anɨb ak agɨlak. Jisas bɨ suŋtep yɨbɨl, Bɨ nad nop aglup ak agɨlak.
